lead_paragraph: PECK--Norman. The New-York Historical Society mourns the passing of our dear friend Norman Peck. Along with his co-trustees of the Peter Jay Sharp Foundation, Dan Lufkin, Edmund Duffy and Barry Tobias, Norman was an extremely generous supporter of our organization over many years. An erudite history buff himself, he was a deeply valued member of the New-York Historical family and will be deeply missed. Pam Schafler, Chair Roger Hertog, Chairman, Executive Committee Richard Reiss, Vice Chair Louise Mirrer, President & CEO 1/3
